page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT : TIME AND PLACE
page.content: {AVERAGE WEEKLY WORKING}HOURS. There is a high level of employment in this area. 20% of all adults in employment have part-time jobs. These are mainly working mothers. Working Hours: Full Time Jobs. 36/40 41/45 46/50 51/60 61/70 71+ 22% 13% 11% 15% 3% 8 Percentage of All Adults. { <<<<<<<<>>>>>>>> {PLACES OF WORK.} The main places of work in the area are farms, public houses, cafes, hotels, shops, schools, Methodist college, doctors' & dentist's surgery, builders, a factory, and bus garage. Sheffield 25% Gt. Longstone 3% Baslow 14% Chatsworth 3% Chesterfield 13% Curbar 3% Eyam 2% Calver 7% Buxton 2% Abroad 2% Bakewell 6% Manchester 2%
